loan.name: Ganjina
loan.use: to purchase cattle and to start a new activity.
loan.description:
Ganjina is a 26-year-old resident of the Temurmalik region. She is not married. She lives with her parents. Her father is engaged in agriculture, where he rents a plot of land. Ganjina herself conducts sewing work out of her home. She sews women's national clothing. She likes her daily income from her sewing work.

Ganjina wants to start a new business raising livestock. She has a barn and feed for the livestock. She needs to buy cattle and to start her activities. She plans to buy cattle, to fatten them over a few months, then sell them at the livestock market. She has insufficient funds to start this operation and she will take out a loan. The requested loan will be a chance for Ganjina to improve the living conditions of her family.
loan.whySpecial: It helps a vulnerable person start a new business.
